name: Rail Rider (wspaar)
description:
Controls:

  • A/D - Accelerate left or right, or spin in midair. Hold Shift to spin faster!
  • Space - Hold to charge a jump, release to take off
  • Esc - Pause

The grind of everyday life wears us all down - why not try a different kind of grind, where you can shred your way to the end of the level and pull off some sick flips?

This game was developed for the Indie Game Dev Beginners game jam, themed around nostalgia - enjoy a mini slice of 90's skateboarding action and shoot for a record time!
